app_detail:
Block Puzzle Jewel Classic - Most popular and addictive puzzle game!

Once you start, you will never stop! 

How to play?
-Drag the blocks to move them
-Try to fit them all in the row or column.Game will be over if there are no room for blocks.
-Blocks can't be rotated

Tips:
-Place the blocks in a reasonable position
-Try to always leave big space 
-The more jewels you eliminate, the more scores you have.

----------

Please help us translate Block Puzzle Jewel Classic into your language.
Contact us via this email: blockpuzzle@zhenglangtech.com. Thank you for making this game better!
